articles.description: Perrier, S.Pellegrino and Acqua Panna are not part of the sale agreement
articles.content: Nestle said on Wednesday it would sell Pure Life and some other struggling North American water brands to two private equity firms for $4.3 billion, as the food giant doubles down on its premium offe… [+1830 chars]
